23 struct QueueFamilyIndices {
24 std::optional<uint32_t> graphicsFamily;
25 std::optional<uint32_t> presentFamily;
26
27 bool isComplete() {
28 return graphicsFamily.has_value() && presentFamily.has_value();
29 }
30 };
